author: bago
msg: Removed the MailStore and changed the dependent object to need Store instead (part of JAMES-412)

author: anathaniel
msg: XSP block: Move AttributeImpl in xsp.xsl to class scope.
That allows top-level xsp:logic to define markup generating methods.
Variable xspAttr renamed to _xspAttr to be avoid breaking existing
XSPs which already use that trick.
